description: An OTY Ball presented by Princess Kachonda and Prince Lyneisha Jeremy Scott in partnership with Skylight Warehouse and Patients Andromeda. Categories include Virgin Runway, Virgin Performance, OTA Face, Sneaker vs Sneaker, Hands Performance, Male Figure Realness, Fashion Killah, Pop Dip and Spin, OTA Body, Female Figure Realness, Lip Sync, Commentator vs Commentator, OTA Runway, Bizarre, Best Dressed, OTA Performance, and OTA Sex Appeal. Doors open at 5:00 pm, LSS at 5:30 pm. DJ: Princess Kachonda Jeremy Scott. Commentators: Prince Tender Jeremy Scott & Princess Pegasus Pinklady. No one is refused entry for lack of funds; contact by noon of March 6th, 2026 if unable to pay. Donations welcome.
price: Walkers: $10, Spectators: $20, Tables: $125, Legends and Icons: $5, Femme Queens and Trans men: Free

description: CARNAZOUK: The Ultimate Brazilian Zouk Day Party & Batucada Finale. Enjoy 5 hours of non-stop dance with Brazilian Zouk, Lambada, and tropical beats. Features a live Brazilian Batucada performance to close the event. Costumes or colorful attire encouraged. Ages 16+. No refunds.

event_name: What's Up Wednesday "Candy Shop" Edition | After Work
dance_style: R&B, Hip-Hop, Afro-Caribbean, Reggae, Dancehall, Afrobeats, Soca, Zouk, Kompa, Salsa, Reggaeton
description: After-work vibes at Ventura Room. 90s/00s R&B, Hip-Hop & Afro-Caribbean. DJs EL NIÑO & NEA + trivia with a $50 DankMart prize. Food and drinks available for purchase. Ages 19+. No refunds.
A wedding show featuring wedding inspiration, fashion, décor, florals, live music, and vendors. Includes giveaways, gift bags for the first 250 guests, and a celebration of love and creativity.

event_name: The Yale Saloon (Part of West Coast Party Crawl)
description: Part of the West Coast Party Crawl. Features complimentary line dancing, bull riding, pool, DJs, and country music.
location: The Duke Saloon, 502 Discovery St, Victoria, BC V8T 1G8, CA

event_name: Good Co Bars (Part of West Coast Party Crawl)
description: Part of the West Coast Party Crawl. Features a great DJ, VIP tables, a dance floor, and lots of lights.

event_name: WEST COAST PARTY CRAWL - ROUTE A
description: Weekly Saturday night party crawl visiting 4 nightclubs on Granville St. Includes 1 shot at each location, free cover at 2 party bars + 2 nightclubs, and skipping the lineup. Features pub games, bull riding, dancing, and DJs. Meet at 1017 On Granville at 9:00 PM. Two pieces of physical ID required. Ages 19+.
Learn to dance three historic social dances: polka, waltz, and menuet. No experience needed. Beginner-friendly. Solo guests and couples welcome. Connected to the Vancouver Spring Gala Ball.

event_name: PERMISSION - A 5Rhythms movement workshop with Anne Marie Hogya
description: PERMISSION is a 5Rhythms® weekend of movement and discovery—listening inward, moving what’s true, and choosing yourself. The workshop explores strength, vulnerability, authenticity, and deep connection through the 5Rhythms Waves map. All are welcome with no previous experience needed. DATES & HOURS: Friday, April 24: 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM; Saturday, April 25: 1:00 PM - 6:00 PM; Sunday, April 26: 12:00 PM - 5:00 PM. Venue is accessible with no stairs. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.
price: $325 (early rate until Feb 26), $355 (standard until Mar 31), $385 (full rate from Apr 1)

event_name: PERMISSION - A 5Rhythms movement workshop with Anne Marie Hogya
description: PERMISSION is a 5Rhythms® weekend of movement and discovery. This session is part of a multi-day workshop. All are welcome with no previous experience needed. Venue is accessible with no stairs.
price: $325 (early rate until Feb 26), $355 (standard until Mar 31), $385 (full rate from Apr 1)

description: This concert will include works by Mozart, Chopin, and Gershwin. The program features pieces by Handel, Mozart, Chopin, Federico Longás, and Gershwin. Noted pianist Sara Davis Buechner will perform. The event is in person and lasts approximately 2 hours. No refunds.

Step out to dance with Olympic Express Big Band's sassy, brassy horns and rhythm in an absinth-infused evening of tomfoolery. Features swing and rock music, an Absinthe Bar with green fairies, and a masquerade theme. 21 and over. Fundraiser to support the Brass Screw Consortium. Doors at 7:00 PM. Free parking. Refunds up to 7 days before event.
location: Port Townsend American Legion Hall, 209 Monroe, Port Townsend, WA 98368, US

event_name: Mozaico Flamenco presents "Fiesta en la Cueva"
description: Mozaico Flamenco presents Tablao Flamenco reminiscent of the caves of Granada in "Fiesta en La Cueva". The show features live flamenco cuadro including 3 singers, 4 flamenco dancers, and a guitarist. The event includes two sets: Act 1 (50 min professional showcase) and Act 2 (50 min professional and community showcase). Suitable for flamenco aficionados and newcomers alike. All ages, free parking, refunds available up to 7 days before the event.
location: 333 Chesterfield, North Vancouver, BC V7M 3G9, CA

description: House & Disco all night in Nanaimo! DJs Michael Gordon & Soul spinning top tracks. Don’t miss the city’s best dance party! Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.

event_name: Brazilian Carnaval 2026 | Samba, DJs & High-Energy Party in Vancouver
description: A full-day Brazilian cultural event in Vancouver featuring music, dance, food, and a high-energy evening party. The event runs from 12:00 PM to 10:00 PM with cultural programming in the afternoon and a high-energy Brazilian party in the evening. Features live samba, axé, batucada, capoeira performances, Brazilian DJs, food vendors, and a festive atmosphere. Presented by Latincouver and the Brazilian Community Association of BC. Tickets are limited; early purchase recommended.
location: Ukrainian Cultural Centre, 3277 Douglas St, Victoria, BC V8Z 3K9, CA

event_name: B'S WAX, a 45rpm BIRTHDAY JAM feat. VINYL RITCHIE, FOXY MORON, CIVILLIAN
dance_style: eclectic, house, breaks, techno, disco, funk, rock, electronic
description: Classic to fantastic, all 45s all night long, no genres, just party. Featuring VINYL RITCHIE, FOXY MORON, CIVILLIAN, Primitive, and mr.b. It’s mr.b’s 45th birthday with a DJ line-up sure to leave no tune left unturned. Ages 19+. No refunds.

Beginner salsa lesson, no partner required! Join us for our special Date Night- Salsa Edition event. This beginner lesson will be taught by Leilani, our salsa specialist. No experience needed. Doors at 6:45 PM. Ages 16+. In person. No refunds.

Viva Santana delivers the soaring guitar and electric Latin rhythms of Carlos Santana, led by Amie Said—authentic, soulful, and unforgettable. Doors: 7:00 PM, Music: 8:00 PM. Full bar and kitchen service available. A high-energy tribute celebrating Santana's music, featuring Amine Said, Aidan Miller, Ray Azecedo, Linaldo Sans, and Santiago Bigelow. Not an imitation—it’s a celebration for listeners, dancers, and music lovers.
location: 6645 East Sooke, Sooke, BC V9Z 1A5, CA

Get ready to dance the best salsa music with a live band and DJ, with an 80's twist! Includes a free salsa lesson at 9:00 PM, live band performance starting at 10:00 PM, and DJ mixing all night. Dress in 80's attire for the anniversary celebration. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.
price: $20 Early Bird, $25 Presale, $30 at the Door

description: An unforgettable night of rhythm, energy, and nonstop dancing featuring DJ Moses 'El Pachanguero' spinning salsa, reggaeton, bachata, and Latin party classics. 4-hour in-person event with no refunds. More info: www.pachangalatina.ca
location: The Queen's, 34 Victoria, Nanaimo, BC V9R 5B8, CA

event_name: South Asian Singles Salsa Mixer | Vancouver
description: An elevated social experience for singles who value connection, culture, and quality. Includes entry to a curated Salsa Singles Mixer, one drink, hosted icebreakers, beginner-friendly salsa session with partner rotations, and open mingling. Ages 21+. Doors at 5:50 PM. No prior salsa experience required. Limited to 50 guests.
Monthly ritual with nonstop vibes playing the best in Dancehall, Soca, Hip-Hop, and Afrobeat with Real West plus special guest DJ. In person event lasting 4 hours. No refunds.
A party celebrating Congo culture with rumba music. Ages 19+. Free parking. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.
location: Vansuya Restaurant and Lounge, 10767 King George, Surrey, BC V3T 0V4, CA

event_name: Nights of Rumba - Rumba of Love
description: HARNAAC presents Nights of Rumba, a premier destination for a vibrant and culturally rich late-night experience through the infectious rhythms of Rumba music. Blending tradition with modern nightlife and networking with like-minded people. Food and drinks available for purchase. Theme: Sapologie (Dress to impress). Sound by Arbovibe. 21+ event with valid ID. No refunds.
location: Gold Coast Ghal Kitchen, 1009 Boren Ave, Seattle, WA 98104, US

event_name: LOVE ME JEJE: AN AFRO-RNB EXPERIENCE NANAIMO
description: Back by Popular Demand! LOVE ME JEJE: AN AFRO-RNB EXPERIENCE Returns To Victoria — Immerse in this unique experience. Come join us for a night of soulful vibes and groovy tunes at EVOLVE NIGHTCLUB! Get ready to dance the night away to the best of Afro-RnB music with a mix of old school classics and modern hits. Featuring DJ SEPS, DJ ASTRO, KONDUKTOR KREMA & OSITA DAVID. Ages 19+, doors at 10PM, no refunds.

event_name: Dynamic Piano Duo Vancouver Debut: Giulia Varga & Siro Saracino Concert
description: Dynamic Piano Duo in Vancouver: Varga & Saracino, one piano–four hands with Tchaikovsky, Grieg, Dvořák, Brahms, Piazzolla & more. Program includes works by Edvard Grieg, Antonin Dvorak, Sergei Rachmaninov, Piotr Tchaikovsky, Johannes Brahms, Dmitri Shostakovich, Sir Anthony Hopkins, Siro Saracino, and Astor Piazzolla. In person event, no refunds.

event_name: Freedom Eve: An Outdoor Music Concert
description: Join us at Freedom Eve for an epic outdoor music bash under the stars—good vibes and great tunes! Bring your friends, your dancing shoes, and your love for live music. It’s the perfect way to kick back and soak up some awesome sounds outdoors. Category: Music, Country. Refunds up to 7 days before event.
location: Borderite Stadium, 1135 Boblett, Blaine, WA 98230, US

description: Put on your most distressed, threadbare, craftiest looks and prepare to punish the dance floor. DJs Craig Huxtable, Mr. Zoth, Corvix, and Molly Pocket will be playing the sickest, most ruinous beats in goth and industrial. Ages 19+. No refunds.

event_name: Kai Gleusteen, violin and Catherine Ordronneau, piano
description: Classical music concert featuring violinist Kai Gleusteen and pianist Catherine Ordronneau. The duo will present works by Elgar, Franck, and Enescu. No refunds.

event_name: Bollywood Club Night: Learn, Dance & Party (Ages 19+)
description: Two dance workshops in one night! Learn beginner-friendly moves to 'The Disco Song' & 'Radha', plus party access after at Club Mumbai. Workshops: 9:00–10:00 PM (The Disco Song) and 10:00–11:00 PM (Radha). Party access included starting at 11:00 PM. Beginner-friendly, inclusive environment with high-energy Bollywood music. No partner required.
price: Single Workshop Pass — $25, Full Workshop Pass — $40, Duo Pass — $60 (2 People)

description: Houseworx brings you a night of outstanding House Music from two of Victoria's native sons and pioneering DJs Rennie Foster and Mr. Moe. The event features 4 hours of in-person house music with a refund policy available up to 7 days before the event.

event_name: Music is Medicine Workshop with Poranguí
description: An interactive vocal activation and body percussion workshop. Rediscover your voice and expression in a celebratory container. No experience necessary.
location: Fort Common, 1019 Blanshard, Victoria, BC, CA

description: An embodied dance ceremony with Poranguí, featuring live improvised grooves and ancestral songs. Special guest Andy Fischer-Price will open the evening. Substance-free, shoe-free, and phone-free space.
location: Fort Common, 1019 Blanshard, Victoria, BC, CA

description: A meditative sound healing ceremony. Bring a yoga mat, blanket, eye mask, and anything needed for comfort. A sanctuary for integration, rejuvenation, and deep listening.
location: Fort Common, 1019 Blanshard, Victoria, BC, CA

description: Join us in the Westshore's newest nightspot for an incredible night of music with Canada's most authentic Tragically Hip Tribute Act. Nautical Disaster brings a night that feels like stepping straight into a Tragically Hip show circa 1995. Expect all the classics, deep cuts, and unforgettable moments. Two ticket styles available: Table Seating and Standing Room. Table Seating requires a reservation on Emporia's website. Standing Room is ideal for dancing and socializing. Music starts at 8:00 PM. No refunds.

event_name: Strings of Legacy – Live Kora Concert for Black History Month in BC
description: Celebrate the end of Black History Month with an evening of music, food, dance, and inspiring stories. This event is a tribute to the achievements and contributions of Black individuals throughout history. Headliners include Senny Camara, Zal Sissokho, and María Carolina Estupiñán. In person event with no refunds.

SIXX PAXX is a popular male revue show known for its acrobatic performances and entertainment. The show features a mix of choreography and audience interaction. Laugh, cheer, and feel the heat until the stage is on fire. Celebrate with a girls’ night out, birthday, or just a night to live it up. Ages 19+. Free parking. Refunds available up to 3 days before the event.

event_name: Black History Month: Celebrating Fela (Afrobeat Pioneer Night)
description: A Black History Month celebration honoring Fela Kuti, the pioneer/father of Afrobeat. Expect a high-energy night featuring best of Fela classics, Afrobeats classics, and Afro-fusion favorites. Music policy: Afrobeat, Afrobeats, Afro-fusion, Classics. Ages 19+. No refunds.
location: Gallery Vancouver, 1312 Southwest Marine, Vancouver, BC V6P 5Z6, CA

description: SALSABOR at the ROWING CLUB. Celebrate the best salsa party dancing all night with spectacular views and fiery Latin rhythms. Two rooms, three DJs, and nonstop dancing with salsa, bachata, merengue, timba, and Latin rhythms. Perfect for couples, friends, or solo dancers. Ages 19+. No refunds.
location: 450 Stanley Park, VANCOUVER, BC V6G 3E2, CA

description: A relaxed, family-friendly party celebrating Latin American music, movement, and connection. description: Every Thursday starting July 17th, join West Trek Social Club at Bar None Nightclub for Student Latin Thursdays. Free entry with guestlist ticket before 10:45 PM. Enjoy Perreo, Salsa, Bachata, Merengue, Reggaeton, Dembow, and Top 40 Latin Club Anthems. Complimentary drink for the first 50 people before 10:30 PM. Message +16043687841 for table bookings or questions.

event_name: WestTrek Student Latin Thursdays at Bar None
description: Every Thursday starting July 17th, join West Trek Social Club at Bar None Nightclub for Student Latin Thursdays. Free entry with guestlist ticket before 10:45 PM. Enjoy Perreo, Salsa, Bachata, Merengue, Reggaeton, Dembow, and Top 40 Latin Club Anthems. Complimentary drink for the first 50 people before 10:30 PM. event_name: Nessi Gomes | SALT SPRING | Feat. UNITE SpeedHealing | Canadian Tour
description: Join us for an unforgettable convergence of heart-opening music and healing vibes with Nessi Gomes on her first Canadian tour. The event includes a SpeedHealing afternoon (2:00 PM - 6:30 PM) with free sample wellness sessions, a vendor market, and community connection activities. The evening concert (7:30 PM - 10:00 PM) features Nessi Gomes performing songs from her album Diamonds & Demons and new unreleased work. Limited capacity, intimate venue. Wheelchair accessible. Not a scent-free environment. Youth welcome if quiet and focused.
location: Fort Common, 1019 Blanshard, Victoria, BC, CA

event_name: Live Music Night at View Royal Hall
description: Enjoy an evening of live music with three of BC's most talented songwriters: Joan Bessie, Lindsay Bryan, and Rebecca Sichon. The View Royal Community Association, with support from CRD Arts and the Juan De Fuca Performing Arts Centre Society, presents an evening of original music. Licensed, all-ages event hosted at the View Royal Community Hall. The venue is fully accessible with a ramp entrance and two private washrooms. No refunds.
location: View Royal Community Hall, 279 Island, Victoria, BC V9B 1G4, CA

event_name: Minimum Wage Band at Station 49 - Free Live Music
description: Catch the Minimum Wage Band rocking Station 49 with free live tunes—good vibes guaranteed! All ages event with free parking. Doors open at 4:00 PM.
location: Mount Royal Station, 2325 10, Calgary, AB, CA

event_name: The Loft Pub welcomes back Demographix Band
description: Great food, great music, fun people. Come out and dance for FREE. Live performance by Demographix Band. No refunds.
location: The Loft Pub, 229 Gorge Road, Esquimalt, BC V9A 1L1, CA

dance_style: Jazz, Contemporary, Hip Hop, House, Ballet, Lindy Hop, Zumba
description: A fun day of dance where you can explore different styles (Jazz, Contemporary, Hip Hop, House, Ballet, Lindy Hop) all in one day. Open to all levels and all genders. Led by top instructors from Vancouver. Includes a Zumba warm-up. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.

event_name: Bloom #2 Ft: DJ SUAR3Z, ANDREW ALLSGOOD, Mr Moe, DJ OZ, SKYLA J, Asta Disasta
dance_style: Amapiano, Latin, Afrobeat, Dancehall, Afro House, Funk
description: Amapiano, Latin, Afrobeat, Dancehall, Afro House and Funk — sounds born from roots, crafted for movement. Come BLOOM again with us. The event features DJ sets from DJ SUAR3Z, ANDREW ALLSGOOD, Mr Moe, DJ OZ, SKYLA J, and Asta Disasta. Ages 19+. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.

dance_style: swing, lindy hop, charleston, vernacular jazz
description: Semi-private swing dance series (Fridays 6-7pm) led by instructor Kat Single-Dain. Covers charleston, lindy hop, and vernacular jazz. Join mid-series or drop in. Contact Kat 604-700-8528. Refunds up to 7 days before event.
price: Series $100 cash on site ($120 e-transfer); drop-in $20 per class

description: Vancouver’s culture under one roof. 20 artists, 10 dancers, surprises all night. Live the experience. Join the movement. Includes performances by 20+ local artists and 10+ local dancers. In person event with no refunds.

event_name: Infidels Jazz Presents: Johanna Hauser at Zameen Art House
description: One of Vancouver's premier bass clarinetists Johanna Hauser will perform free jazz and improvised music with Matthew Ariaratnam (Guitar) and Nikko Whitworth (Bass). The New Thing is a monthly series dedicated to free jazz and improvised music, presented by Infidels Jazz and the VJO Society. Doors open at 7:30 PM.

A dance party celebrating 80s/90s/00s Hip Hop with DJ Abel and special guests. Features artists like OutKast, Shaggy, Busta Rhymes, Missy Elliott, Sean Paul, DMX, UGK, Damian Marley, Rick James, Kanye West, Snoop Dogg, Bobby Brown, Wyclef Jean, Destiny’s Child, and De La Soul. Two-room, full-venue dance party with a 19+ age restriction. No refunds.
location: Fox Cabaret, 2321 Main, Vancouver, BC V5T, CA

description: A throwback dance party featuring the greatest songs of the 80s and 90s. Doors open at 10:30 PM. General admission for ages 19+. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.
location: Fox Cabaret, 2321 Main, Vancouver, BC V5T, CA

description: A dance party featuring hits from the 90s to now, including artists like Spice Girls and BTS. DJs Adam Fink and Bryan Sea will be playing. The event is 19+ and runs from 10:30 PM to 2:00 AM. Tickets are available online and at the door. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.
location: Fox Cabaret, 2321 Main, Vancouver, BC V5T, CA

description: A throwback battle of the decades with Common People DJs. Featuring hits from the 90s and 00s, including artists like TLC, The Black Eyed Peas, Ginuwine, 50 Cent, Madonna, Lady Gaga, House of Pain, and Outkast. Two-room dance party with special resident and guest DJs. Ages 19+. Doors open at 10:30 PM.
location: Fox Cabaret, 2321 Main, Vancouver, BC V5T, CA

description: A night of 2000s hits with Common People DJs. The Fox Cabaret presents a dance party dedicated to 2000s hits featuring Avril Lavigne, Outkast, and more. Two-room, full-venue dance party with special resident and guest DJs. Ages 19+. Doors open at 10:30 PM. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.
location: Fox Cabaret, 2321 Main, Vancouver, BC V5T, CA

description: A high-energy celebration of Original Pilipino Music (OPM) featuring live performances of classic and modern OPM hits. Expect a night of dancing, singing, and nostalgia. Doors open at 5:30 PM. Ages 19+. No refunds. Free parking available.
location: 350 Gifford, NEW WESTMINSTER, BC V3M 7A3, CA

event_name: Afrobeat in Victoria BC | Let's Party in Victoria
description: Get ready to dance and vibe to the best Afrobeat tunes in Victoria. This in-person party is all about good music, great energy, and having a blast with friends. Open to all, whether you're a die-hard fan or new to Afrobeat rhythms.

event_name: LOST DOG SUNDAYS: ረብሻ Rebsha & Joe Williamson (solo)
description: The return of LOST DOG SUNDAYS continues with ረብሻ (Rebsha), an Ethio-ambient duo by Feven Kidane and Nebyu Yohannes, and Joe Williamson (solo). The event is a monthly music series curated by Cole Schmidt and Kevin Romain, presented by Barking Sphinx on stolen Coast Salish land.

event_name: LOST DOG SUNDAYS: ረብሻ Rebsha & Joe Williamson (solo)
description: ረብሻ (Rebsha) is the Ethio-ambient duo created by Feven Kidane and Nebyu Yohannes. The event features live music by ረብሻ Rebsha and Joe Williamson (solo). LOST DOG SUNDAYS is a monthly music series curated by Cole Schmidt and Kevin Romain, presented by Barking Sphinx. No refunds.
Ward Dance open to all ages.
location: The Church House, 1601 Mill, Bellingham, WA 98225, CA

description: Recurring event: Calling all mamas! Come join us on the dance floor for a night curated just for YOU. 90s and early 2000s throwbacks and more! This night is for all mamas, mamas-to-be, grand-mamas, aunties! Join us for a night of creative expression, freedom of movement, and community building. Music featuring 90s and early 2000s dance throwbacks. Includes Mama's Dance (6:00-8:00pm) and Closing circle (8:00-8:30pm). Light refreshments and tea will be served. Babes in arms welcome (protective headphones suggested for baby).

event_name: The Downbeat Presents: DJ Praiz, Money, DJ All Good
description: OG Party Rockers are storming the club for this night. DJ Praiz (Squamish) and DJ Allgood (Canadian DMC Champ) will perform. Praiz is a master turntablist who focuses on making people dance. DJ Allgood, a 5-time National Turntable Champion, will open with an extended set featuring deeper cuts and party rockers. Live drums by Mike Cooper. Ages 19+. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.

Passion & Performance turns 15! A high-energy throwback inspired by MuchMusic Dance, club culture, and peak 2000s nightlife. Includes a dance show (7:00–8:30 PM) and a party with DJ Marlon (8:30 PM–12:00 AM). Ages 19+. No refunds.
location: 1528 Stelly's Cross, SAANICHTON, BC V8M 1S8, CA

description: Join the magic as we dance under the full Worm Moon at Willows Beach. This event is a Thank You Party for those who donated $20+ towards Jewel's surgery bill. Eclectic music in an ecstatic dance wave form. All ages, genders, and abilities welcome. Bring warm layers, water, and a mug for tea. No dogs permitted (seabird sanctuary).

dance_style: live music, rock and roll, R&B, country, rockabilly
description: The Sutcliffes are a Beatles tribute band covering early period songs and seminal influences like Chuck Berry, Ray Charles, and Elvis. Doors open at 6:00 PM for dinner service. Tickets are no longer available through the Oak Bay Recreation Centre; call Marie at 250-812-7978 for direct purchase. No refunds.
location: Oak Bay Recreation - Personal Training/Active Rehab, 1975 Bee, Victoria, BC, CA

dance_style: fusion, micro-fusion, blues, tango, west coast swing, waltz, zouk, lindy, bachata
description: Weekly partner dance gathering rooted in connection, consent, and creative collaboration. Includes an intro lesson (7:00–7:30 PM) and open dancing (7:30–9:30 PM). No partner required, beginners welcome, gender-free lead/follow, role switching encouraged. Recreational drug- and alcohol-free space. Financial support available—ask an organizer. Consent and safety guidelines apply. Clean, non-scuffing indoor shoes recommended.
location: Brigid's Loft, 280 Quincy, Port Townsend, WA 98368, US

location: 4814 West Saanich, VICTORIA, BC V8Z3H5, CA

description: Van Django is a standout gypsy jazz act with a clever mix of standards, classical ditties, rock homages, and solid originals. The concert is a listening room event in an all-ages licensed restaurant and bar. Doors open at 6:00 PM for dinner service. No refunds.
location: Oak Bay Recreation - Personal Training/Active Rehab, 1975 Bee, Victoria, BC, CA

event_name: Throwdown Thursday featuring Jacob Leger w/ Sail Cassady & Elise LeBlanc
description: Throwdown Thursday is the Duke Saloon's local music showcase featuring Jacob Leger (indie-folk), Sail Cassady (LGBTQ2A-friendly indie-rock), and Elise LeBlanc (country/western swing). 19+ event. No refunds. In person.
location: The Duke Saloon, 502 Discovery St, Victoria, BC V8T 1G8, CA

event_name: Casino Country Night with The Rob Curtis Band
description: Enjoy a night of country music by The Rob Curtis Band, featuring hits from Alan Jackson, Shania Twain, Garth Brooks, and more. Includes a FREE line dancing lesson from 6:15–7:00 PM, live performances by Stephanie Greeves (7:00–8:00 PM) and The Rob Curtis Band (8:30–10:30 PM). Full bar service, spacious dance floor, and free parking available. Ages 19+. Doors open at 6:00 PM.
Victoria's Biggest Non-Alc Wine, Beer, and Cocktail Tasting! Swing by for 10 minutes, or stay for two hours. Participants include various non-alcoholic beverage brands.
location: 1925 Blanshard ST, VICTORIA, BC V8T4J2, CA

event_name: Shawn Daniels & Inner Cowboy - A Night of Kick ASS Country Rock
description: Shawn Daniels is on the rise with his kick ass country rock. Joined by local country vets Inner Cowboys, this show will be a high-energy, dance floor-friendly mix of country rock and emotional ballads. Ages 19+, free parking, doors at 7:00 PM. Refunds up to 7 days before event.

dance_style: Hip Hop, Urban, House, Jazz, Bollywood, Latin, African, Contemporary, Swing, Disco
description: Let's come together to unite, celebrate, connect, play, heal, and get healthy through dance. GROOVE is a unique way that makes dance easy, accessible, and fun for everyone. Movements are purpose-driven and designed to build strength. The class incorporates aspects from yoga, pilates, dance, and fitness, featuring moves from various dance styles. No experience or coordination necessary. Doors open at 6:15 PM; no late entry. By donation; finances should not be a barrier to attending.

A live music event featuring 14 Flamingos and special guests Ryan Patrick Haint and Noah and Maylee. 14 Flamingos is a collective of musicians who work with dancers, artists, and circus performers to bring unique sounds combining art rock, nu-wave, surf rock, and more. The event is in person and lasts 3 hours. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.
location: 2716 Rock Bay AVE, VICTORIA, BC V8T4R9, CA

event_name: Saturday Night Party Pass! No Line, No Cover + 3 Drinks Included!
description: Recurring event: The CABANA PARTY PASS includes cover, priority entry, 3 drinks, and is valid all night. A $50 value for just $15. Features Vancouver's best club DJs playing a mix of Hip Hop, Top 40, and Dance Hits. Ages 19+. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.

event_name: Saturday Night Party Pass! No Line, No Cover + 3 Drinks Included!
description: Recurring event: The CABANA PARTY PASS includes cover, priority entry, 3 drinks, and is valid all night. A $50 value for just $15. Features Vancouver's best club DJs playing a mix of Hip Hop, Top 40, and Dance Hits. Ages 19+. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event.

event_name: La Clave Orchestra presents "Casa Del Ritmo" Valentines Special Ft. Guest
dance_style: salsa, merengue, cumbia, latin, urban, reggaeton
description: Join us for the ultimate LIVE latin night, a Valentine Special in Vancouver with La Clave Orchestra Ft. Guest Fabricio Zuñiga from Colombia! Live performance by La Clave Orchestra and special guest Fabricio Zuñiga. DJ Jose T will play Latin, Urban, Reggaeton, and Club Hits between sets. Dine and dance, dress to impress. Limited capacity, table reservations available for groups of 4+. Ages 19+, doors at 8PM. No refunds.
price: CA$33.28 (price goes up at the door)

event_name: The Concert Series at The Flamingo Room
description: A high-energy night of live music featuring Cyrus Jordan as the main act and Runner as the opening act. Includes a Flor de Caña welcome cocktail. VIP booths available for groups of 4-6 with priority seating and snacks. Ages 19+. Refunds available up to 3 days before the event.
location: The Flamingo Room, 1214 Commercial, Vancouver, BC V5L 2T4, CA

description: Get ready to dance all night long with the legendary MUSTAFA SANDAL in Vancouver! Expect a high-energy, emotionally charged atmosphere as Mustafa Sandal performs his biggest classics and fan-favorite anthems. Includes live performance, DJ performance, dance show, and local singer. Dress code: stylish & elegant. Ages 19+. No refunds. Line-up subject to change.

Join amarElas and Batucada Abrace for an afternoon of live samba and powerful female voices in honour of International Women’s Day. This women-centered roda de samba celebrates International Women’s Day through music, joy, and community. Led by amarElas, a band of Brazilian women musicians in Vancouver, this event highlights songs by iconic female artists and honors the strength, creativity, and vibrance of women in samba. Batucada Abrace brings the energy of their women-led percussion crew. The event also features a small marketplace showcasing women entrepreneurs. Family-friendly, bilingual, and open to all. Dress code (optional): white for unity or bright colors for joy. Children ages 0–12 must register for a free child ticket.

JUNO Award-winning guitarist and singer Alpha Yaya Diallo, from Guinea in West Africa, presents an evening of world music. The venue has plenty of room for dancing. Featuring Etienne Mangala on bass, Knowledge Majoni on drums, Aboubacar Kone on keyboards and percussion, and Hassanatou Camara on backup vocals and dancing. All ages event with doors at 6:45 PM. No refunds.

event_name: 7th Victoria International Kizomba Festival: Bachata & Kizomba
description: 4 days of workshops, 3 day-time socials, 4 nights of dancing, 30+ hours of workshops, 40+ performances & gala. Must be 18+ to attend. Refunds available up to 7 days before the event. COVID-19 clause: Event may be postponed or cancelled due to pandemic restrictions.

dance_style: semi-classical Indian dance, burlesque, aerial dance, pole dance
description: Help support local artist & icon Kai Rae Khushi with immigration costs! Features Drag, Burlesque, Aerial Artists, and a DJ. All proceeds go to Kai Rae Khushi. Ages 19+. Doors at 7:00 PM. Refunds up to 7 days before event.
location: Fort Techtoria, 777 Fort, Victoria, BC, CA

event_name: Guided Práctica w/ Gabriela Condrea & Special Guest David Huh
description: Author of WHEN 1+1=1 Gabriela Condrea's connection-centered approach to Argentine Tango, with special guest David Huh. Come get your tango tune-up! All levels welcome, from newer tango dancers to seasoned milongueros. Registration required via Eventbrite. No refunds, but slots are transferrable. Contact: tangoisabouttheconnection@gmail.com or 206-778-3239.

event_name: Tango Basics & Tango II (Adv. Beginners) Series w/ Gabriela Condrea
description: 6-week series for Tango Basics (All Levels) and Tango II (Adv. Beginner/Intermediate). Tango Basics: Introduction/re-introduction to the fundamentals of Argentine Tango. Tango II: Refine and fine-tune classic tango moves for the social dance floor. Role-balanced, no partner necessary. Pre-registration required.
location: Phinney Center, 6532 Phinney, Seattle, WA 98103, US

event_name: Tango II (Adv. Beginner/Intermediate) Series w/ Gabriela Condrea
description: 6-week series for Tango II (Adv. Beginner/Intermediate). Delve deeper into the basics and refine/fine-tune social tango moves. Role-balanced, no partner necessary. Pre-registration required. Pre-requisite: Tango Basics Series or similar experience.
location: Phinney Center, 6532 Phinney, Seattle, WA 98103, US

description: A lively panel discussion about how humor and absurdity illuminate dark themes, celebrating Scott Lambridis's debut novel. Featuring readings and a Q&A with local writers. St. Ulphia’s Dead is a darkly comic literary novel about disgraced medical researchers investigating mass psychosis and disappearances on a remote island.
location: Village Books and Paper Dreams, 1200 11th, Bellingham, WA 98225, US
